Script.name: Item DB Lookup
Script.script:
function itemLookup(target, maxMatches)
local path = getMudletHomeDir().."/Item DB Lookup/itemdb.txt"
local file = io.open(path)
if file == nil then cecho("\n\n<DarkRed:>Error: Unable to open "..path) return end
local contents = file:read("*all") local count = 0
maxMatches = maxMatches or 100
-- strip carriage returns if present contents = string.gsub(contents, "\r\n", "\n")
-- Find first character after blank line local itemStart = string.find(contents, "\n\n") + 2
while itemStart < string.len(contents) do
local itemEnd = string.find(contents, "\n\n", itemStart + 1) local item = string.sub(contents, itemStart, itemEnd)
-- case-insensitive compare if string.find(item:upper(), target:upper()) then count = count + 1 cecho("\n<LightBlue:>"..item) end
itemStart = itemEnd + 2
if(count == maxMatches) then cecho("\n<LightBlue:>Max matches reached.") break end
end
cecho("\n<LightBlue:>"..count.." items found matching \""..target.."\".\n\n")
end
